TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsIdentity extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable, class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
Public Class WindowsIdentity Inherits ClaimsIdentity Implements IDeserializationCallback, IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class WindowsIdentity : System::Security::Claims::ClaimsIdentity, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type WindowsIdentity = class inherit ClaimsIdentity interface IIdentity interface IDeserializationCallback interface ISerializable interface IDisposable

summary.span: Represents a Windows user.

span.span: Represents a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法用來建立物件，表示目前的使用者。Call the method to create a object that represents the current user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用之成員的類別。The following example shows the use of members of class. 如需範例，示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，透過呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，並且使用該權杖模擬另一位使用者，請參閱類別。For an example showing how to obtain a Windows account token through a call to the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and use that token to impersonate another user, see the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Negotiate`| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| > [!NOTE] > 您可以擷取所代表的語彙基元`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 要釋放`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

span.span: is 0.

span.span: -or- is duplicated and invalid for impersonation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string sUserPrincipalName) cil managed

param.name: sUserPrincipalName
param.span: The UPN for the user on whose behalf the code is running.

span.span: The UPN for the user on whose behalf the code is running.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified User Principal Name (UPN).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified User Principal Name (UPN).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UPN 格式*使用者名稱*@*domainname*.com，也就是說，電子郵件地址。A UPN has the format *username*@*domainname*.com, in other words, an email address. 中所識別的 UPN`sUserPrincipalName`用來擷取該使用者透過 Win32 API 的權杖`LsaLogonUser`函式。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 接著該語彙基元用來識別使用者。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 因為無法使用所提供的 UPN 來登入，可能會傳回例外狀況。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式被用於只能在已加入至 Windows Server 2003 或更新版本的網域的電腦上。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 例外狀況會擲回先前的網域類型。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 這項限制是因為，這個建構函式會使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 結構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，最初導入 Windows Server 2003 中。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

exception.span: Windows returned the Windows NT status code STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED.

span.span: Windows returned the Windows NT status code STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED.

span.span: There is insufficient memory available.

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permissions.

exception.span: -or- The computer is not attached to a Windows 2003 or later domain.

span.span: -or- The computer is not attached to a Windows 2003 or later domain.

exception.span: -or- The computer is not running Windows 2003 or later.

span.span: -or- The computer is not running Windows 2003 or later.

exception.span: -or- The user is not a member of the domain the computer is attached to.

span.span: -or- The user is not a member of the domain the computer is attached to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`Normal`| ||`false`| 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組要`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統中，並在`Kerberos`舊版 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統不會使用此值;這是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. > [!NOTE] > 您可以擷取所代表的語彙基元`userToken`藉由呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 API`LogonUser`函式。You can retrieve the token represented by `userToken` by calling unmanaged code such as the Win32 API `LogonUser` function. 要釋放`userToken`藉由呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`函式。Always release `userToken` by calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` function. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information on calling unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用建構函式建立的新執行個體使用者指定的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元和指定的驗證類型所代表的類別。The following code shows the use of the constructor to create a new instance of the class for the user represented by the specified Windows account token and the specified authentication type. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`type`參數用來設定參數。The value of the `type` parameter is used to set the parameter. 如果`type`是`null`，安全性系統組要`Negotiate`Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統中，並在`Kerberos`舊版 Windows 作業系統上。If `type` is `null`, the security system sets to `Negotiate` on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, and to `Kerberos` on earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 安全性系統不會使用此值;這是僅供內部使用。The security system does not use this value; it is for informational use only. 中所識別的 UPN`sUserPrincipalName`用來擷取該使用者透過 Win32 API 的權杖`LsaLogonUser`函式。The UPN identified in `sUserPrincipalName` is used to retrieve a token for that user through the Win32 API `LsaLogonUser` function. 接著該語彙基元用來識別使用者。In turn that token is used to identify the user. 因為無法使用所提供的 UPN 來登入，可能會傳回例外狀況。An exception might be returned due to the inability to log on using the supplied UPN. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式被用於只能在已加入至 Windows Server 2003 或更新版本的網域的電腦上。This constructor is intended for use only on computers joined to Windows Server 2003 or later domains. 例外狀況會擲回先前的網域類型。An exception is thrown for earlier domain types. 這項限制是因為，這個建構函式會使用[KERB_S4U_LOGON 結構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533)，最初導入 Windows Server 2003 中。This restriction is due to the fact that this constructor uses the [KERB_S4U_LOGON structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143533), which was first introduced in Windows Server 2003.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性僅提供資訊;它不是由安全性系統。This property is informational; it is not used by the security system. 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統上，這個屬性的預設值是`Negotiate`，從中進行選擇最佳的安全性支援提供者 (SSP) 根據客戶設定的安全性原則。On Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, the default value for this property is `Negotiate`, which chooses the best security support provider (SSP) based on customer-configured security policy. 舊版的 Windows 作業系統的預設屬性值是`Kerberos`。The default property value for earlier versions of the Windows operating system is `Kerberos`.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the .

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: Returns a object that you can use as a sentinel value in your code to represent an anonymous user.

span.span: Returns a object that you can use as a sentinel value in your code to represent an anonymous user.

summary.span: The property value does not represent the built-in anonymous identity used by the Windows operating system.

span.span: The property value does not represent the built-in anonymous identity used by the Windows operating system.

returns.span: An object that represents an anonymous user.

span.span: An object that represents an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回空物件，可讓您將作業視為匿名。This property returns an empty object that enables you to treat operations as anonymous. 屬性值未對應到 Windows 的匿名使用者，並不能用於模擬。The property value does not correspond to a Windows anonymous user and cannot be used for impersonation. 此外，請注意這個屬性所傳回的身分識別不是靜態的;每次呼叫傳回不同的匿名識別。Also, note that the identity returned by this property is not static; each call to returns a different anonymous identity. 您可以使用屬性來偵測的傳回值。You can use the property to detect the return value from . 不過，會偵測 Windows 匿名身分識別，並由這個方法傳回匿名身分識別。However, detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity returned by this method. 若要使用的第二個身分識別，快取傳回值，而不是依賴屬性。To use the latter identity, cache the return value instead of relying on the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用方法來傳回物件，表示匿名 Windows 使用者。The following code shows the use of the method to return a object that represents an anonymous Windows user. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks `desiredAccess`參數會指定識別的存取權限的存取權杖的要求的類型的存取遮罩。The `desiredAccess` parameter specifies an access mask that identifies the requested types of access to the access token. 這些要求的存取類型的語彙基元的判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，以判斷哪些類型的存取權限會授與或拒絕與相比較。These requested access types are compared with the token's discretionary access control list (DACL) to determine which types of access are granted or denied.

Public Overridable Function Impersonate () As WindowsImpersonationContext
abstract member Impersonate : unit -> System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext override this.Impersonate : unit -> System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext

summary.span: Impersonates the user represented by the object.

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the object.

returns.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this can be used to revert to the original user's context.

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台，目前的使用者必須具有足夠的權限，以允許模擬。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，藉由呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，以及如何使用該權杖來模擬其他使用者，然後還原成原始身分識別。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: An anonymous identity attempted to perform an impersonation.

span.span: An anonymous identity attempted to perform an impersonation.

exception.span: A Win32 error occurred.

span.span: A Win32 error occurred.

span.para: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me 檔案) 平台沒有使用者權杖，因為模擬能在這些平台上的位置。
Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) platforms do not have user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.
在使用後，請務必呼叫方法以結束模擬。
After using , it is important to call the method to end the impersonation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext Impersonate(native int userToken) cil managed
Public Shared Function Impersonate (userToken As IntPtr) As WindowsImpersonationContext

param.name: userToken
param.span: The handle of a Windows account token.

span.span: The handle of a Windows account token.

param.span: This token is usually retrieved through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API function.

span.span: This token is usually retrieved through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API function.

summary.span: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.

span.span: Impersonates the user represented by the specified user token.

returns.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows NT 平台，目前的使用者必須具有足夠的權限，以允許模擬。On Windows NT platforms, the current user must have sufficient rights to allow impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫方法`userToken`的值相當於呼叫 Win32`RevertToSelf`函式。Calling the method with a `userToken` value of is equivalent to calling the Win32 `RevertToSelf` function. 如果另一位使用者目前正被模擬，控制項將會還原為原始使用者。If another user is currently being impersonated, control reverts to the original user. 如需有關呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得 Windows 帳戶語彙基元，藉由呼叫 unmanaged 的 Win32`LogonUser`函式，以及如何使用該權杖來模擬其他使用者，然後還原成原始身分識別。The following example demonstrates how to obtain a Windows account token by calling the unmanaged Win32 `LogonUser` function, and how to use that token to impersonate another user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/windowsidentity impersonation2/vb/source.vb#1)]

Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) platforms do not have user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會偵測 Windows 匿名身分識別和所傳回的匿名識別方法。The property detects both the Windows anonymous identity and the anonymous identity that is returned by the method. 匿名帳戶通常只會遇到只能從 ASP.NET 應用程式內時由網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 允許匿名存取。Anonymous accounts are typically only encountered only from within ASP.NET-based applications when anonymous access is allowed by Internet Information Services (IIS). ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用屬性來偵測使用者帳戶是否已由系統識別為匿名帳戶。The following code shows the use of the property to detect whether the user account is identified as an anonymous account by the system. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 可唯一識別使用者或群組，在所有 Windows NT 實作上。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. 傳回的 SID 識別預設擁有者將會套用至新建立之物件的 SID。The returned SID identifies the default owner SID that will be applied to newly created objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用顯示語彙基元擁有人的安全識別項的屬性。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the security identifier for the token owner. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Token As IntPtr
public: virtual property IntPtr Token { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: Gets the Windows account token for the user.

span.span: Gets the Windows account token for the user.

value.span: 與目前所執行的執行緒相關聯的存取語彙基元控制代碼。

span.span: The handle of the access token associated with the current execution thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿明確釋放由帳戶語彙基元屬性。Do not explicitly release the account token that is returned by the property. 語彙基元，會釋放方法，您可以在程式碼中呼叫。The token is released by the method, which you can call in code. 也會自動由記憶體回收行程呼叫。 is also automatically called by the garbage collector. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回的帳戶語彙基元屬性是用來建立 Windows 語彙基元的複本物件，並由.NET Framework 時，就會自動釋放。The account token that is returned by the property is a duplicate of the Windows token that is used to create the object and is automatically released by the .NET Framework. 這是不同的帳戶語彙基元 (`userToken`建構函式的參數)，這用來建立物件。This is different from the account token (the `userToken` parameter for the constructor), which is used to create the object. `userToken` 是的呼叫所建立的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元`LogonUser`和必須關閉，以避免記憶體流失。`userToken` is a Windows account token that is created by a call to `LogonUser` and must be closed to avoid a memory leak. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用屬性來取得使用者的 Windows 帳戶語彙基元。The following code shows the use of the property to get the Windows account token for the user. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CPP/windowsidentitymembers.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/CS/windowsidentitymembers.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity_AllMembers/VB/Form1.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property User As SecurityIdentifier

summary.span: Gets the security identifier (SID) for the user.

span.span: Gets the security identifier (SID) for the user.
An object for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SID 可唯一識別使用者或群組，在所有 Windows NT 實作上。The SID uniquely identifies a user or group on all Windows NT implementations. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回的物件方法不是 Windows 的匿名使用者相同。The object returned by the method is not the same as the Windows anonymous user. 這個屬性會取得`null`所表示匿名使用者所傳回的物件方法; 它不會取得代表匿名 Windows 使用者的 SID。This property gets `null` for an anonymous user represented by the object returned by the method; it does not get the SID representing an anonymous Windows user.
